name: Ice Ballerina: Dance & Skating
description:
The ice skating competition is about to start and the pretty skater is ready to teach you how to teach you how to become a real ice dance queen!

Take your skates and jump to the ice rink to start training with the lovely ballerina. Learn the routine and let this pretty skater to teach you all the secrets of the ice skating. Become the next dance queen on the ice and win the figure skating competition. Come meet this pretty ballerina and play now!

But, before the competition, you will enjoy finding the dress and the make up for the big day! Choose your skater outfit and makeup! Customize your skates and accessories to look like a real ice dance queen! This is a day to shine! Are you ready to be the next best skater ballerina?

Features:
- Enjoy the skating competition and become the next dance queen on ice!
- Have fun choosing your skater ballerina outfit and makeup!
- Go and relax to the spa after the skating training!
- Take pictures of your favorite moments with this pretty skater and share them with your friends!

Any ballerina can become a dance queen training in this game! Our pretty instructor will teach you how to achieve your dancing achievements. Take your skates and jump to the ice rink! Play now!
